title: Lockhart's Hair Pomade Goon Grease Heavy Hold 4 ounces (2 pack)
description: Goon Grease is as heavy as it gets from Lockhart's. This authentic pomade will definitely keep your hair in place and will give you the classic, slicked back look that a lot of people who use these products are looking for. It has great conditioning properties in addition to its powerful styling abilities, so your hair is very well protected during the day and you don't have to worry about not only sloppiness and flyaways, you also don't have to worry about damage from the environment as much as you would otherwise.
